title: How to Make a Paper Plate Turtle

steps.headline: Cut a paper plate in half or keep the plate as is if preferred.
Draw, color, or paint things on the shell.
Glue pictures on the shell, if you want.
steps.description: Or you can draw on the shell as well.

steps.headline: Cut out a circle out of green paper.
Draw eyes.
steps.description: Better yet, glue on googly eyes!

steps.headline: Glue the head on the shell.
Cut out feet and a tail out out of green paper.
Finished!
steps.description: You now have a turtle friend!

text: Cut a paper plate in half or keep the plate as is if preferred. This is the shell. Draw, color, or paint things on the shell.  Glue pictures on the shell, if you want. Or you can draw on the shell as well. Cut out a circle out of green paper.  Draw a smile.  Draw eyes. Better yet, glue on googly eyes! Glue the head on the shell.  Cut out feet and a tail out out of green paper.  Glue it on.  Finished! You now have a turtle friend!
